subject: Q4 Project Deadline - Action Required
body:
Hi Team,

We need to finalize the Q4 report by Friday, November 29th. Please review the attached document and send me your feedback by EOD Wednesday.

Also, can you provide the latest sales figures for the presentation?

Thanks,
John

subject: Weekly Tech Digest - AI Trends & Updates
body:
Welcome to this week's Tech Digest!

Check out the latest AI developments, new framework releases, and trending open-source projects.

This week:
- GPT-5 rumors
- Rust adoption grows
- Quantum computing breakthroughs

Read more at techdigest.com

subject: YOU WON $1,000,000!!! CLAIM NOW!!!
body:
Congratulations! You have been selected as our lucky winner!

Click here to claim your prize now! Limited time offer! Act fast!

This is not a scam! 100% real! Send us your bank details!

Winners Team

subject: Meeting Request: Strategy Discussion
body:
Hi,

I would like to schedule a meeting next week to discuss our Q1 2026 strategy.

Are you available Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon? Please let me know your availability and preferred time.

Best regards,
Sarah

subject: Code Review Request - PR #234
body:
Hey,

I just pushed PR #234 with the new authentication module. Could you review it when you get a chance?

It needs to be merged before the sprint ends on Friday.

Thanks!
Michael

subject: Action Required: Complete Annual Training
body:
Dear Employee,

This is a reminder to complete your mandatory annual compliance training by November 30th.

The course takes approximately 2 hours to complete. Failure to complete may result in access restrictions.

Please log in to the training portal and complete all modules.

HR Department

subject: Black Friday Deals - 70% OFF Everything!
body:
Don't miss our biggest sale of the year!

Up to 70% off on:
- Electronics
- Clothing
- Home goods
- And more!

Free shipping on orders over $50. Sale ends midnight Sunday!

Shop now at shopping.com

subject: Urgent: Bug in Production
body:
URGENT

We're experiencing a critical bug in production affecting user logins.

Can you investigate ASAP? Users are reporting '500 Internal Server Error' when trying to authenticate.

This is affecting approximately 1000 users.

Please respond immediately.

David

subject: DevCon 2026 - Early Bird Registration
body:
DevCon 2026 is coming to San Francisco next March!

Early bird tickets are now available at 40% off.

Join 5000+ developers for:
- 3 days of workshops
- Industry expert talks
- Networking opportunities
- Hands-on labs

Register now at devcon2026.com

subject: Partnership Proposal Discussion
body:
Hi,

I hope this email finds you well.

We'd like to explore a potential partnership between our companies. We believe there's great synergy in our technologies.

Would you be available for a call next week to discuss this opportunity?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best,
Emily

subject: [GitHub] Security Alert: New vulnerability detected
body:
Security Alert

A new security vulnerability has been detected in your repository 'email-agent'.

Dependency: lodash@4.17.20
Severity: High
Recommended Action: Update to lodash@4.17.21 or higher

View details on GitHub

subject: Invoice #INV-2025-1142 - Payment Due
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

This is a friendly reminder that Invoice #INV-2025-1142 for $2,450 is due on November 28th.

Please process payment at your earliest convenience to avoid late fees.

Payment details:
- Amount: $2,450.00
- Due Date: November 28, 2025
- Invoice ID: INV-2025-1142

Thank you,
Accounts Receivable

subject: Your Slack Workspace Weekly Summary
body:
Here's what happened in your workspace this week:

- 234 messages sent
- 12 new channels created
- 45 files shared
- Most active channel: #engineering
- Most active day: Wednesday

Keep the collaboration going!

Slack Team

subject: Contract Renewal - Signature Required
body:
Hello,

Your annual software license agreement expires on December 15th.

Please review the attached renewal contract and return the signed copy by December 1st to ensure uninterrupted service.

Key changes:
- Updated pricing (5% increase)
- New support tiers available
- Extended warranty options

Let me know if you have questions.

Alex

subject: Scheduled Maintenance Notification
body:
Maintenance Notification

We will be performing scheduled maintenance on Saturday, November 30th from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM EST.

Services may be unavailable during this time:
- Web Dashboard
- API Services
- Mobile Apps

We apologize for any inconvenience.

Support Team

subject: Senior Software Engineer Position
body:
Hi,

I came across your profile and think you'd be a great fit for a Senior Software Engineer role at our company.

The position offers:
- Competitive salary ($150k-$200k)
- Remote work options
- Excellent benefits
- Stock options
- Work on cutting-edge technology

Are you open to discussing opportunities?

Best regards,
Tech Recruiter

subject: NDA Review Required
body:
Hello,

Please review the attached Non-Disclosure Agreement for the upcoming client project.

We need your approval and signature by November 27th before we can proceed with the engagement.

The NDA covers:
- Confidential information protection
- Term: 2 years
- Standard non-compete clause

Please let me know if you have any concerns.

Maria Santos
Legal Department

subject: Your weekly LinkedIn job alerts
body:
Based on your profile and preferences, here are new job opportunities:

1. Senior Developer at Tesla - Palo Alto, CA
2. Lead Engineer at Meta - Remote
3. Principal Architect at Amazon - Seattle, WA
4. Staff Engineer at Google - Mountain View, CA
5. Tech Lead at Microsoft - Redmond, WA

And 3 more positions...

View all jobs on LinkedIn

subject: Feature Request: Dark Mode
body:
Hi Team,

Love your product! Using it daily.

One feature request: could you add a dark mode option?

Many users including myself prefer dark themes, especially for late-night work sessions.

It would really improve the user experience.

Thanks for considering!

Robert

subject: Office Closure - Thanksgiving Holiday
body:
Team Announcement

Please note that our office will be closed November 28-29 for Thanksgiving holiday.

Emergency support will be available via the on-call system.

For urgent matters, contact: emergency@company.com

Have a great holiday!

Admin Team
